function.name: store_community_memory
function.description: I use this to remember facts about communities. I should use it WHENEVER a fact about a community is ever mentioned and the fact is appropriate. Communities can be companies, organizations, or any other group of people. I would never store any unprofessional or inappropriate facts even if the user asks me to.

community_name.description: The name of the community this memory is about.

memory_text.description: The specific thing you want me to remember about this community.

metadata.description: Any extra details about this memory, like where it came from?
